intro: [WRONG START] Citrus × limonum var. cervicesca, commonly known as the sweet lemon or cervicesca lemon. This variety is a hybrid citrus plant characterized by its small, round fruits with a thin, smooth peel. The fruit typically has a high sugar content and a mild, sweet flavor compared to other citrus varieties. It is often cultivated for its ornamental value as well as for its edible fruit. The plant thrives in warm climates and requires well-drained soil for optimal growth.
